name: BodyBall
description:
BodyBall is the lovechild of Sepak Takraw (Foot Volleyball) and the Anime scene

It's a 4-player 2V2 match where you need to jump, flip and kick the ball to keep it off the ground. If the ball stays on the ground for more than two seconds than thats a point to the other team. First team to 21 wins!
